DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this extension study is to collect additional 48 weeks of safety data from patients taking TIP who have completed the core study CTBM100C2401. The purpose of collecting second year safety data through this study is to obtain long-term (2 years) safety data of TIP.
DOC.brief_title: Ext. Long-term Safety Study in CF Patients: Single Arm TIP
DOC.criteria: Completion of the core study CTBM100C2401 and able to comply with all protocol requirements of the extension study Serum creatinine 2mg/dl, BUN 40mg/dl or proteinuria 2+ or more at the time of entry into the extension Use of loop diuretics within 7 days prior to entry into the extension study Pregnant or nursing women Women of child bearing potential unless using highly effective method of contraception as indicated in the protoco
DOC.keyword: CF, Open-label, TIP, phase IV, extension study
